title: AI-Powered Recipe Generator
description: AI Recipe Generator is a smart web application that creates personalized recipes based on available ingredients, making cooking faster and more creative.

title: Hotel Mangement and Listing Platform
description: A full-stack web application that enables users to browse, manage, and list properties through a structured and user-friendly interface, powered by a scalable backend and RESTful APIs.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application that enables seamless communication between users with instant message delivery through a responsive and interactive interface.
